activities:
The organization is in direct marketing by print catalogs and by ten websites.  Customers in the EU may visit the US-based websites and (1) request a catalog be mailed to it, (2) join up for an e-mail newsletter or promotional e-mails, or (3) order merchandise from the website, thereby providing name, shipping, and billing information, as well as telephone number and e-mail address.
* Privacy Policies for each of the organization's websites can be located at the following URLs:
http://www.hanoverdirect.com/index5.htm
http://www.undergear.com/ug-privacy-and-security.html
http://www.scandiadown.com/privacypage.asp?privacy
http://www.thecompanystore.com/privacy.html
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The Direct Marketing Association's Safe Harbor Program
